Name: AzSK_Delete_existing_server
Description: Delete a server and all contained databases and elastic pools

Name: AzSK_Get_server_administrator
Description: Retrieve server administrator details

Name: AzSK_Create_new_or_update_existing_server_administrator
Description: Create or update server administrator

Name: AzSK_Delete_server_administrator
Description: Delete server administrator from the server

Name: AzSK_Create_new_or_update_existing_server_firewall_rule
Description: Create or update server firewall rule that controls IP address range allowed to connect to the server

Name: AzSK_Delete_server_firewall_rule
Description: Delete firewall rule from the server

Name: AzSK_Delete_elastic_database_pool
Description: Delete existing elastic database pool

Name: AzSK_Create_new_or_update_existing_server
Description: Create a new server or modify properties of existing server in a resource group on a subscription

Name: AzSK_Delete_existing_server
Description: Delete a server and all contained databases and elastic pools

Name: AzSK_Create_new_database_from_DacPac
Description: Create a new database on the server and deploy schema and data from a DacPac package

Name: AzSK_Force_terminate_the_replication_relationship
Description: Terminate the replication relationship forcefully and with potential data loss

Name: AzSK_Terminate_the_replication_relationship
Description: Terminate the replication relationship forcefully or after synchronizing with the partner

Name: AzSK_Failover_replication_relationship_after_synchronizing
Description: Failover after synchronizing all changes from the primary, making this database into the replication relationship's primary and making the remote primary into a secondary

Name: AzSK_Failover_replication_relationship_immediately
Description: Failover immediately with potential data loss, making this database into the replication relationship's primary and making the remote primary into a secondary

Name: AzSK_Set_database_data_masking_policy
Description: Change data masking policy for a given database

Name: AzSK_Set_database_data_masking_policy_rule
Description: Change data masking policy rule for a given database

Name: AzSK_Delete_database_data_masking_policy_rule
Description: Delete data masking policy rule for a given database

Name: AzSK_Set_database_connection_policy
Description: Change connection policy for a given database

Name: AzSK_Change_transparent_data_encryption_state
Description: Enable or disable transparent data encryption for a given database

Name: AzSK_Set_database_auditing_policy
Description: Change auditing policy for a given database

Name: AzSK_Register_ServiceBus_Resource_Provider
Description: Registers the subscription for the ServiceBus resource provider and enables the creation of ServiceBus resources

Name: AzSK_Delete_Namespace
Description: Delete Namespace Resource

Name: AzSK_Create_or_Update_Namespace_Authorization_Rules
Description: Create a Namespace level Authorization Rules and update its properties. The Authorization Rules Access Rights, the Primary and Secondary Keys can be updated.

Name: AzSK_Delete_Namespace_Authorization_Rule
Description: Delete Namespace Authorization Rule. The Default Namespace Authorization Rule cannot be deleted.

Name: AzSK_Get_Namespace_Listkeys
Description: Get the Connection String to the Namespace

Name: AzSK_Resource_Regeneratekeys
Description: Regenerate the Primary or Secondary key to the Resource

Name: AzSK_Delete_Queue
Description: Operation to delete Queue Resource

Name: AzSK_Create_or_Update_Queue_Authorization_Rule
Description: Create Queue Authorization Rules and Update its properties. The Authorization Rules Access Rights, the Primary and Secondary Keys can be updated.

Name: AzSK_Delete_Queue_Authorization_Rules
Description: Operation to delete Queue Authorization Rules

Name: AzSK_List_Queue_keys
Description: Get the Connection String to Queue

Name: AzSK_Resource_Regeneratekeys
Description: Regenerate the Primary or Secondary key to the Resource

Name: AzSK_Delete_Topic
Description: Operation to delete Topic Resource

Name: AzSK_Create_or_Update_Topic_Authorization_Rule
Description: Create Topic Authorization Rules and Update its properties. The Authorization Rules Access Rights, the Primary and Secondary Keys can be updated.

Name: AzSK_Delete_Topic_Authorization_Rules
Description: Operation to delete Topic Authorization Rules

Name: AzSK_List_Topic_keys
Description: Get the Connection String to Topic

Name: AzSK_Resource_Regeneratekeys
Description: Regenerate the Primary or Secondary key to the Resource

Name: AzSK_Delete_TopicSubscription
Description: Operation to delete TopicSubscription Resource

Name: AzSK_Assign_the_caller_to_User_Access_Administrator_role
Description: Grants the caller User Access Administrator access at the tenant scope

Name: AzSK_Set_administrator
Description: Add or modify administrator to a subscription.

Name: AzSK_Delete_administrator
Description: Removes the administrator from the subscription.

Name: AzSK_Add_management_locks
Description: Add locks at the specified scope.

Name: AzSK_Delete_management_locks
Description: Delete locks at the specified scope.

Name: AzSK_Create_policy_assignment
Description: Create a policy assignment at the specified scope.

Name: AzSK_Delete_policy_assignment
Description: Delete a policy assignment at the specified scope.

Name: AzSK_Create_policy_definition
Description: Create a custom policy definition.

Name: AzSK_Delete_policy_definition
Description: Delete a policy definition.

Name: AzSK_Create_role_assignment
Description: Create a role assignment at the specified scope.

Name: AzSK_Delete_role_assignment
Description: Delete a role assignment at the specified scope.

Name: AzSK_Register_Storage_Resource_Provider
Description: Registers the subscription for the storage resource provider and enables the creation of storage accounts.

Name: AzSK_Delete_Storage_Account
Description: Deletes an existing storage account.

Name: AzSK_List_Storage_Account_Keys
Description: Returns the access keys for the specified storage account.

Name: AzSK_Regenerate_Storage_Account_Keys
Description: Regenerates the access keys for the specified storage account.

Name: AzSK_Register_Subscription
Description: Registers the subscription

Name: AzSK_Create_or_Update_DNS_Zone
Description: Create or update a DNS zone within a resource group.  Used to update the tags on a DNS zone resource. Note that this command can not be used to create or update record sets within the zone.

Name: AzSK_Delete_DNS_Zone
Description: Delete the DNS zone, in JSON format. The zone properties include tags, etag, numberOfRecordSets, and maxNumberOfRecordSets.

Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_MX
Description: Create or update a record set of type ?MX? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_MX
Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?MX? from a DNS zone.

Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_AAAA
Description: Create or update a record set of type ?AAAA? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_AAAA
Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?AAAA? from a DNS zone.

Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_CNAME
Description: Create or update a record set of type ?CNAME? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_CNAME
Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?CNAME? from a DNS zone.

Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_a_record_set_of_type_SRV
Description: Create or update record set of type SRV

Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_SRV
Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?SRV? from a DNS zone.

Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_PTR
Description: Create or update a record set of type ?PTR? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_PTR
Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?PTR? from a DNS zone.

Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_A
Description: Create or update a record set of type ?A? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_A
Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?A? from a DNS zone.

Name: AzSK_Create_or_update_record_set_of_type_TXT
Description: Create or update a record set of type ?TXT? within a DNS zone. The records specified will replace the current records in the record set.

Name: AzSK_Delete_record_set_of_type_TXT
Description: Remove the record set of a given name and type ?TXT? from a DNS zone.
